title: Biden’s Grotesque Assault On The Constitution (Ep 1782)
description:
In this episode, I address the grotesque assault on the Constitution emanating from the Biden White House. 

News Picks:


COVID restrictions stunted kids' immune systems, could explain surge of other illnesses: scientists. 


Another awful jobs report.


Fact Checker Tries to Debunk Study Proving Masks Didn't Work in Europe, Fails Miserably.


No Free Lunch: Biden Admin Will Pull Meal Funding for Schools That Don’t Comply With Its LGBT Agenda.

Gun sales over 1 million for 34 straight months. 


Biden calls for sweeping gun control agenda in wake of Uvalde massacre.
